definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
lit. flowers in a mirror and the moon reflected in the lake (idiom)/fig. an unrealistic rosy view/viewing things through rose-tinted spectacles/also written 水月鏡花|水月镜花
Jinghua Yuan or Flowers in the Mirror, Qing novel of fantasy and erudition (early 19th century) by Li Ruzhen 李汝珍[Li3 Ru3 zhen1]

sentences.english: Still remember the days when you are infatuated with mirage?
sentences.chinese: 可还记得那迷恋镜花水月的日子吗？

sentences.english: That achievement is at bottom empty?
Jing hua yuan (Affinity Between Minor and Flower) is one of ancient novels with the most contents of Traditional Chinese Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 《镜花缘》是古代记载中医药内容最多的小说之一。

sentences.english: A dream nobody cares, a Suigetsu mirror flower wasted.
sentences.chinese: 抗缆一场无人问津的梦，一场水月镜花的蹉跎。

sentences.english: In the fanciful reflection of the moonlit water.
However, 25 years later the DRDO missiles remain off target.
sentences.chinese: 但是在25年之后，DRDO的导弹仍然是镜花水月。

sentences.english: Abstract: [to] picked: "jinghuayuan" is one of the four great classics of ancient Chinese ghost story.
sentences.chinese: 《镜花缘》是我国古代神怪小说四大名著之一。

sentences.english: The past is the past, don't miss nothing else.
sentences.chinese: 过去就是过去了，不要留恋镜花水月。

sentences.english: That passes just like a flower in the mirror and a moon in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 那只是一场镜花水月杂用英语说？

sentences.english: Heard mirror spent lightly, Moon Water , I really want you.
sentences.chinese: 听见镜花轻轻地说，水月，我真的很想你。

definition: Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
Palace in the Moon (in folk tales)
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
The Goddess, 1934 silent film about a Shanghai prostitute, directed by 吳永剛|吴永刚[Wu2 Yong3 gang1]
